so_15077483: #!/bin/bash                                                                                                         

for file in ./HW5/*; do
  if [ -d "$file" ]; then
    cp ./mondial.* ./"$file"
  fi
done

for file in ./HW5/*/; do 
  cp ./mondial.* ./"$file"
done
ul_239635: M-T    Cut from the cursor position to the end of the file

so_58697712: $Directory = "C:\test"
$files = Get-ChildItem -path $Directory | 
    where-object { $_.LastWriteTime -lt (Get-Date).AddDays(-45) } | 
    Select-Object -ExpandProperty FullName
foreach($file in $files){
    Add-Content -Path C:\test\log.log -Value "Deleted file: $file"
    Remove-Item -path $file -Recurse -Force -Confirm:$false
}
